title: Katarina
body:
Hello there LoL community. My name is Osenator and I'm new to this game and I wan to say something. So I heard Katarina was absolutely amazing
and deals so much damage so I bought here for 3150 IP, but after playing 2 games I already realized that she didn't to any damage at all.
I watched this video about what to buy with Katarina https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=By4Cr0oavCU&t=140s. In that video she deals so much damage,
and I'm asking myself, how? I was playing with Xin Zhao and I did so much damage but with Katarina I don't do anywhere near as much damage as Xin Zhao.
Am I doing something wrong, and remember I just started playing this game so please no hate.

replies.body:
first : this is italian forum,you should go into the english one
second : your damange depends by many factors,like enemy MR (magic resistence),if you are feed or not,if they use some ability which can lower your damange (like {{summoner:3}} ,{{champion:12}} ulti,{{champion:37}}  passive whit w...),your build etc.etc.
third : this build is bad,you have no damange,i know she usually start whit {{item:3146}},she can instakill garen because he have no item and is behind

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox99,realm=EUW,application-id=cAOZwaUi,discussion-id=ympQaA5p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-04T17:18:29.444+0000)
>
> first : this is an italian forum,you should go into the english one
> second : your damage depends by many factors,like enemy MR (magic resistence),if you are fed or not,if they use some abilities which can lower your damage (like {{summoner:3}} ,{{champion:12}} ulti,{{champion:37}}  passive with w...),your build etc.etc.
> third : this build is bad,you have no damage,i know she usually starts with {{item:3146}},she can instakill garen because he have no items and he is behind
ah,si,andavo di fretta (ero in champion select) ed ho un'inglese di merda xD
Well katarina isnt easy today anymore but before preseason 7 she was easy to learn
